title: 69: Coach Your Novel
dc:creator: Canon Press
description:
This week's episode highlights the difference between coaching and teaching, and how to do both well...especially as this applies to a novel. What happens when your novel is coming in less than half the length you wanted it to be? How do you fix that and other first-draft problems? These and other problems are taught in NDW's video course, "The School of Fantastical Wordcraft," but you get the intro here...

#SASF #StoriesAreSoulFood #NDWilson #FantasticalWordcraft
